SEARCH
Package com.gmail.aydinov.sergey.simple_debugger_plugin.processor

Interface SimpleDebugEventCollector

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleDebuggerEventQueue
public interface SimpleDebugEventCollector
Collector interface for debug events generated by the Simple Debugger. Allows asynchronous collection and retrieval of debug events.

Author: Sergei Aidinov
Email: sergey.aydinov@gmail.com

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    collectDebugEvent(AbstractSimpleDebugEvent event)
    Collects a debug event for later processing.
    AbstractSimpleDebugEvent
    takeDebugEvent()
    Retrieves the next debug event for processing.

  • Method Details

    • collectDebugEvent

      void collectDebugEvent(AbstractSimpleDebugEvent event)
      Collects a debug event for later processing.
      Parameters:
      event - the debug event to collect

    • takeDebugEvent

      AbstractSimpleDebugEvent takeDebugEvent() throws InterruptedException
      Retrieves the next debug event for processing. This method blocks if no events are currently available.
      Returns:
      the next collected debug event
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting
